name: blademaster basic
matches: ^With a smooth lunge to the \w+, (\w+) draws .+ from its scabbard and delivers a powerful slash across your \w+\.$
^Lashing out with a clenched fist, (\w+) aims a precise strike at your sternum\.$
^Sweeping out with a blade hand, (\w+) strikes at the back of your knee.$
^As (\w+) draws .+ from its scabbard, s?he drives the pommel into your chin\.$
^With a fluid motion, (\w+) aims a blow just below your shoulder.$
^With masterful technique, (\w+) draws .+ from its scabbard and unleashes \w+ precise strikes towards you\.$
